website_summaries.verdict: Intended for preschoolers and young elementary age children, this band lets your child pick avatars and gives them animal-themed movement challenges.
pros: Preloaded with 50 active challenges to make kids move
Can set play times, challenges and other features
Parent controls on LeapFrog Connect make it easy to set play times, challenges and more
cons: Battery wears down quickly, may quit charging

customer_reviews.title: A smart watch for children without the expense and blandness of adult smartwatches
customer_reviews.text: Great little bit of tech for my daughter who is obsessed with my Apple Watch, I don't intend spending another £400 on a smart watch so when I saw this I thought she will love it as its basically a child friendly smart watch which is brought by one of the best educational toy manufacturers, I tested the product before putting it away for Christmas, which we do with all techy gifts - as it would be upsetting to get a gift that is faulty after all the excitement, the leapband was reactive and colourful, a lot more child friendly that "real" smart watch/bands. I'm sure she will love matching her daddy when she gets this gift
customer_reviews.author: Pindy

customer_reviews.title: Glad I didn't pay full price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at Christmas for my 4 year old. Luckily on offer £10. I certainly wouldn't pay more. It's confusing. Needs to be charged and set up via laptop and there doesn't appear to be any way of tracking the child's activity. The more active they are the more joules they collect, but my child has been collecting them by just pressing buttons anyway? There isn't much incentive for him to follow the instructions. It's now in a toy box. Glad I didn't pay more
customer_reviews.author: Oops

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: While I really like the idea and concept behind this it is huge! I bought it for my son and even on the tightest fitting it is far too big and uncomfortable. He never uses it. A smaller version would be better!
customer_reviews.author: Aiken R

customer_reviews.title: Like a kids Fitbit although she found out you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter for Christmas, she’s still playing with it every now and then. Like a kids Fitbit although she found out you can actually cheat and not do any jumping etc and still gain the gems!
customer_reviews.author: Snugglepuff

customer_reviews.title: Great looking toy
customer_reviews.text: Looked a really nice toy, unfortunately my little boy won't geqt to play with it as our home was involved in a burglary and stole all our Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelynne

customer_reviews.title: However great idea to keep children healthy and active
customer_reviews.text: Would say more for the older ones as my LO doesn't understand it. However great idea to keep children healthy and active. It is quite bulky so my children won't wear on their wrists. Baught in the sale don't think I would pay full price though.
customer_reviews.author: amy l wilson

customer_reviews.title: ok

customer_reviews.title: Over Rated
customer_reviews.text: This was the one thing that my son raved about for Cheistmas and weeks before and us the first thing relegated to the back if his cupboard. The adverts make it look more exciting than what it is, essentially a stop watch. Drove me insane being timed to do everything!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Should encourage active play.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew who is 4 just after Christmas. Looks like really good fun and should encourage active play to get him away from sitting for ages on tablet apps. Don't yet know if it's a hit as he doesn't actually get it until January.
customer_reviews.author: susan murray

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a small device which sits nicely on a child's wrist. It gets children to get up and exercise, however it is not worth getting unless you have a computer or tablet as it has to be charged by one with a cable, the cable needed is not included
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Great watch with hours of fun x

customer_reviews.title: Confusing tech !

customer_reviews.title: The kids wont stop moving
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to get the kids active. Does what it says on the box. Great toy.

customer_reviews.title: Encourages active play.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a useful and fun distraction from playing games on a tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's 4th birthday and the only issue I have with it, is how to get it off him! He loves it and is desperate to do "exercises" to make his character more happy and earn jewels. Much happier for him to have this than a tablet where he would be stuck on a chair - this definitely encourages activity through achievement. Delighted with product - totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mrs McM

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Amazon prices...
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 4 of these as gifts in different colours. However the green one crashed and screen never worked again after the childs first use for no reason. Not impressed by that, nor was the disappointed child but Amazon fantastic about sending out a quick replacement... Kids do love them but do not play with often, good game app on phone and tablets which is extra bonus...
customer_reviews.author: AYDC

customer_reviews.title: A good smart watch for kids
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and kids love it. Its got a mobile app that lets kids play games and they earn rewards in terms of new pets and unlocking new games. It has a dependency on a software to be installed on a PC (similar to Apple iTunes) which has parental controls such as Lock watch during school hours or bed time. Absolutely fabulous product and will recommend as a gift for your child.
customer_reviews.author: Vish Soh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gadget for my 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! Its a tamagotchi, has a few games, keeps my son fit with its challenges and a watch! This can all be tracked in joules (points given as a reward) and monitored by plugging in with a usb cable provided to charge. Perfect gadget for my 3 year old boy. Through my laptop I can put the watch to sleep at certain intervals when my son goes to sleep, nursery so he knows its not a round the clock thing. Also amazing that I dont need to buy batteries as the wire charges it!
customer_reviews.author: FAIZA

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use...
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually pretty good with technology we are a house full of Apple, garmin, vivofit etc however this thing had me stumped. None of us could work out exactly what to do with it, other than being a very expensive tamagotchi on a strap. Not sure what exercise it was supposed to encourage or track. I know the screen needs to be big enough so have a decent display but the watch itself was far too big for a child and was huge on both my 4yr old and 7yr old. Once the novelty of having a watch on, approx 3hrs as it was so big it was annoying him, it got dumped in a toybox.
customer_reviews.author: CherR

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I will rate this down simply because the strap is too small for a 6 year old. Even tho they say it fits to age 7. The strap is also not flexible or comfy. This should put you off to be honest I personally don't care what the watch will offer if my son can't wear it comfortably. Also u have to use a laptop to charge it. Not ideal to some housholds.
customer_reviews.author: SEOrocks

customer_reviews.title: Like most adult smartwatches this is now sitting in a drawer unused and uncharged
customer_reviews.text: My son loves gadgets as much as me and so I decided to buy him this LeapFrog LeapBand when I saw it reduced on Amazon, the fitness and exercise element was particularly appealing as it's not something you would associate with kids tech. In theory this thing is great - a cool smartwatch like Dad, games, tamagotchi style pet on your wrist, exercise tracker. Sadly my son lost interest within a week, the battery life wasn't particularly good and needed charging quite often, the games weren't all that great, and the watch was really quite bulky on a childs wrist. Like most adult smartwatches this is now sitting in a drawer unused and uncharged.
customer_reviews.author: MR C

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Great activity watch, bought a few months ago but 4 year old really enjoys playing it now and unlocking characters. Great price here too
customer_reviews.author: Shoegal

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for ages 5 and up to really get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend for ages 5 and up to really get the most of the product. Great fun and loads of features.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My son only wore this watch 3 times before it stopped working..
customer_reviews.author: biola

customer_reviews.title: Good item, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Not been opened but you can't complain at £10, sure my daughter will love it on Christmas :) thanks
customer_reviews.author: Leen

customer_reviews.title: a welcome gift for a grandson,
customer_reviews.text: a welcome gift for a grandson, it was on his wish list and he was very excited to receive it

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of these as birthday presents & the kids just loved them! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kidd

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a blue watch and gave it as a gift and when they opened it realised that i had been given a green one. Extremely dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for winter months
customer_reviews.text: LeapBands are my favorite child activity band to help keep kids active during winter months. Both of my children have one and they are great because I can program the exercises i want each child to do. So my 8yr old and 2 yr old can both enjoy them. There is an app to go with it so you can earn more jewels and outfits for your pet. You can also unlock other pets after completing so many activities. It is definitely good to have to encourage healthy and activeness in young children.
customer_reviews.author: T.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year Old bc she loves wearing my watch! She doesn’t understand what’s it saying yet but she loves it! I k ow as she gets older she’ll be able To use the features more! I am very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: chloe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old twins absolutely love this watch, it encourages them to be more active by giving them activities such as wiggle like a worm, jump like a kangaroo it is an all around fun watch for kids. Before purchasing I read a lot of reviews that said it’s too big for small children I disagree because one of my twins is on the smaller side and it looked completely ok on him
customer_reviews.author: Mizmac

customer_reviews.title: Fun Watch
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a gift for our 4 year old son. There were many pros and cons. Pros: 1. The games were fun and kept him entertained. 2. He liked the reminders and felt like he was wearing a big boy watch. 3. While basic the graphics made him laugh. Cons: 1. UI was not as friendly as I would expect it to be. 2. Battery drained fast and charging was a pain. 3. Very basic games and son grew bored quite quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MOmom22

customer_reviews.title: Watch needs program downloaded on windows friendly computer.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is cute and fun for my 4 year old but I’m annoyed that you can’t use the watch without downloading a program from the leapfrog website. This makes the watch less easy to use as this program is only accessible on a windows friendly computer, something NOT mentioned in the description and that is why I’m rating this 3 stars. This watch would be much better and easier to use if it had an app downloadable on a tablet and this is something that I feel should be mentioned clearly in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her watch. I wish the battery last longer but still awesome so far..
customer_reviews.author: Pricilla Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Entertains and encourages them to be active
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Introduction to Activity Tracking
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson, age 3-1/2, initially asked for the Kidizoom SmartWatch but his mother wisely directed me to this instead as he has other camera hardware and she thought he might benefit more from activity tracking with the LeapFrog LeapBand. (They both like and enjoy his LeapFrog tablet quite a lot, so we knew it was a name we could trust.) Our grandson, who is physically active in any case, really enjoys doing the audio challenges and we were happy to round out his arsenal of toys with a technology gift that gets him up and moving as opposed to sitting. The price is right, in my view, for what you're getting here.
customer_reviews.author: GPM56

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Toy
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves Leap Band so much that his is a our second purchase so we always have a spare. He has autism and a brain injury and does not play with any of his toys really, but this he loves. Surgeries, tests, MRI - we always bring his watch. The Leap Band comforts and occupies him. Was concerned it would be to complicated, but the Leap Band gives him credit even when he does get it quite right and he is learning.
customer_reviews.author: Gram

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan...
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the strap small (barely fits a three year old), but the volume on the band is very low. My son doesn't bother with it too much.
customer_reviews.author: TeElle

customer_reviews.title: It is nice that it shuts off on its own if not ...
customer_reviews.text: This came exactly as described. We bought it for our 3.5 year old son. He loves it! I do wish it had a few more games on it. It is nice that it shuts off on its own if not being played with to conserve the battery. My son loves picking out which animal he wants and naming it. His favorite part is the "exercise" things it tells him to do, like hopping in a line. Overall very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and wont charge
customer_reviews.text: Ours will not charge, its not worth the money. Bought it for my 3 year old. The V-Tech one I bought my 5yr old niece is much better! ETA: I added a start, I contacted V-Tech who sent a replacement out. I still think its a waste of money. It does not charge when hooked up to the wall USB charger, only the computer.
customer_reviews.author: CookingwithChristine

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 6year old for Christmas and he ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6year old for Christmas and he has only taken it off to charge! It come with its own charger and you can hook it to your computer to set bedtimes and school times. During "off" times it only shows the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but my boys didn't love it
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as I hoped it would be based on the features and review. Minimal setup; easy to charge and use; adorable graphics; not too noisy in the volume. However, my sons did in "love" it, they just like it. They do take them along for car trips, but at home they are basically sitting on the table. At age 3 and 5, they still prefer other toys.
customer_reviews.author: ddroses

customer_reviews.title: Its Like a fitbit for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my kids have these (8 & 5) they love them. It gets them moving & has cute games on it.
customer_reviews.author: brandy w

customer_reviews.title: LeapFrog LeapBand, Blue
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old gr son got it for Christmas and he loves it, jumps around like a kangaroo and got his mom doing it too! but now he is more interested in his mind craft games, once in a while we tell him, go get your watch and exercise...OH. And there's a little animal you have to feed too. It's cute. Yes, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: coupecheveux

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps later on but its too repetitive and boring which when I play to see why he doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 4 year and he wasn't much into it. Perhaps later on but its too repetitive and boring which when I play to see why he doesn't like it, I see why. It received it on time but this could've been more entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Hribal

customer_reviews.title: LeapFrog and parent company were hacked, and there is ...
customer_reviews.text: LeapFrog and parent company were hacked, and there is no additional content available since their website is basically down. No resolution in sight either. Based on that alone, I would return this item if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I did because he loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old saw this watch on a commercial and asked me to buy it for him. I am so glad I did because he loves it. If you ever saw the commercial, it does exactly as it describes. My son loves it because he "can be like mommy," since I have a fit bit, and he know that it is for exercising too. I love this watch because it keeps him entertained and it allows him to be active instead of always playing on the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple Sun

customer_reviews.title: 2yr olds Dream
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my two year old daughter. She loves it and is always asking to wear it and play with it at home(it gives me something to treat her with when she behaves well).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has fun games and is engaging without being video-game engaging
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old loves this watch! He got it for Christmas and he hasn't taken it off since he got it. It has fun games and is engaging without being video-game engaging. The battery life seems decent.
customer_reviews.author: adk

customer_reviews.title: It gives him a great incentive to move around
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old nephew for Christmas. It really got him up and moving. He really enjoys the games and getting different creatures. It gives him a great incentive to move around.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clay

customer_reviews.title: These are really fun for our boys
customer_reviews.text: These are really fun for our boys. They only keep them entertained for a max of 10 minutes, but maybe they will grow to play with them a bit longer as they get older :) Otherwise, they are a great quality product and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: RobertFamily

customer_reviews.title: This isn't a bad watch just doesn't hold the attention of little ones ...
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a bad watch just doesn't hold the attention of little ones for very long. Just get the vtech smartwatch instead. I purchased both for a 4 and 6 year old. Both like the vtech better.
customer_reviews.author: GeekSquad

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this product is lots of fun. my son loves it and it keeps him very active. i love that you can set quite hours on it so it will only tell the time like a normal watch during certain hours like school time.
customer_reviews.author: A.pici

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping kids active. My 3.5 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves his leapband!! I love that he still gets to enjoy the games but they keep him active. Mommy happy, kid happy. All is good!

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THIS PRODUCT FOR MY GRANDAUGHTER
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THIS PRODUCT FOR MY GRANDAUGHTER . SHE IS MORE ACTIVE NOW LOTS OF GOOD FEATURES EXCELENT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfrdo Gonzalez Calder VLOG

customer_reviews.title: Games and Education
customer_reviews.text: Kids love video games! Why not combine the video game with education. That's what this watch does. Kids love and will play with it till the batteries die. Then you have to think of something for them to do while recharging. :)
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Joe Wynman

product_meta.title: LeapFrog LeapBand, Blue
product_meta.description: The LeapFrog Activity Band is a children's activity band that encourages physical activity through fun challenges. Kids run, jump and play to earn rewards and power a customizable pet pal that lives on the band.
feature_bullets: Experience the first activity tracker made for kids—LeapBand is fit made fun!
Preload LeapBand with 50 active challenges that get kids moving, like “Pounce like a lion!"
Parent controls on LeapFrog Connect make it easy to set play times, challenges and more.
Encourages active play, nurturing and healthy choices.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars421 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
